00041 CEGASprit::CEGASprit(int planesize,
00042       long spritestartloc,
00043       int numsprites,
00044       long spriteloc,
00045       const std::string &gamepath,
00046       size_t episode) :
00047 m_gamepath(gamepath),
00048 m_Episode(episode),
00049 EGASpriteModell(NULL)
00050 {
00051  m_planesize = planesize;
00052  m_spritestartloc = spritestartloc;
00053  m_numsprites = numsprites;
00054  m_spriteloc = spriteloc;
00055 }

00057 
00058 bool CEGASprit::loadHead(char *data)
00059 {
00060  data += m_spritestartloc;
00061  
00062  EGASpriteModell = new st_sprite[m_numsprites];
00063  
00064     for(int i=0 ; i<m_numsprites ; i++ )
00065     {
00066      memcpy(&(EGASpriteModell[i].width),data+128*i,2);
00067      memcpy(&(EGASpriteModell[i].height),data+128*i+2,2);
00068      memcpy(&(EGASpriteModell[i].location_offset),data+128*i+4,2);
00069      memcpy(&(EGASpriteModell[i].location),data+128*i+6,2);
00070      memcpy(&(EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_l),data+128*i+8,2);
00071      memcpy(&(EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_u),data+128*i+10,2);
00072      memcpy(&(EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_r),data+128*i+12,2);
00073      memcpy(&(EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_b),data+128*i+14,2);
00074      memcpy(EGASpriteModell[i].name,data+128*i+16,12);
00075      memcpy(&(EGASpriteModell[i].hv_offset),data+128*i+28,4);
00076   
00077      EGASpriteModell[i].width *= 8; // Where the width is divided by 8
00078      EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_l >>= 8;
00079      EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_u >>= 8;
00080      EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_r >>= 8;
00081      EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_b >>= 8;
00082     }
00083  
00084     return true;
00085 }
00086 
00087 bool CEGASprit::loadData(const std::string& filename, bool compresseddata)
00088 {
00089  byte *RawData;
00090     SDL_Surface *sfc;
00091     Uint8* pixel;
00092  
00093  FILE* latchfile = OpenGameFile(filename.c_str(),"rb");
00094  
00095  if(!latchfile)
00096   return false;
00097  
00098  RawData = new byte[m_planesize * 5];
00099     // get the data out of the file into the memory, decompressing it if necessary.
00100     if (compresseddata)
00101     {
00102   if (lz_decompress(latchfile, RawData))
00103    return 1;
00104     }
00105     else
00106     {
00107      for(int i=0 ; i<(m_planesize*5) ; i++)
00108       RawData[i] = fgetc(latchfile);
00109     }
00110  
00111     fclose(latchfile);
00112  
00113     // TODO: Try to blit the Font map here!
00114  // these are the offsets of the different video planes as
00115  // relative to each other--that is if a pixel in plane1
00116  // is at N, the byte for that same pixel in plane3 will be
00117  // at (N + plane3).
00118  unsigned long plane1, plane2, plane3, plane4, plane5;
00119  
00120  plane1 = 0;
00121  plane2 = (m_planesize * 1);
00122  plane3 = (m_planesize * 2);
00123  plane4 = (m_planesize * 3);
00124  plane5 = (m_planesize * 4);
00125  
00126  CPlanes Planes(RawData + m_spriteloc);
00127  Planes.setOffsets(plane1, plane2, plane3, plane4, plane5);
00128  
00129  // load the image data
00130  g_pGfxEngine->createEmptySprites(MAX_SPRITES+1);
00131  for(int i=0 ; i<m_numsprites ; i++)
00132  {
00133   CSprite &Sprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(i);
00134   Sprite.setSize( EGASpriteModell[i].width, EGASpriteModell[i].height );
00135   Sprite.setBouncingBoxCoordinates( (EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_l << STC),
00136     (EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_u << STC),
00137     (EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_r << STC),
00138     (EGASpriteModell[i].hitbox_b << STC) );
00139   Sprite.createSurface( g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface->flags,
00140     g_pGfxEngine->Palette.m_Palette );
00141  }
00142 
00143  for(int p=0 ; p<4 ; p++)
00144  {
00145   for(int s=0 ; s<m_numsprites ; s++)
00146   {
00147    sfc = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(s).getSDLSurface();
00148    if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(sfc)) SDL_LockSurface(sfc);
00149    pixel = (Uint8*) sfc->pixels;
00150 
00151    Planes.readPlane(p, pixel, sfc->w, sfc->h);
00152 
00153    if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(sfc)) SDL_UnlockSurface(sfc);
00154   }
00155  }
00156 
00157  // now load the 5th plane, which contains the sprite masks.
00158  // note that we invert the mask because our graphics functions
00159  // use white on black masks whereas keen uses black on white.
00160  for(int s=0 ; s<m_numsprites ; s++)
00161  {
00162   CSprite &Sprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(s);
00163   SDL_Surface *pixsfc = Sprite.getSDLSurface();
00164   SDL_Surface *masksfc = Sprite.getSDLMaskSurface();
00165 
00166   if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(pixsfc)) SDL_LockSurface(pixsfc);
00167   if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(masksfc)) SDL_LockSurface(masksfc);
00168 
00169   pixel = (Uint8*) masksfc->pixels;
00170 
00171   for(int y=0 ; y<masksfc->h ; y++)
00172   {
00173    for(int x=0 ; x<masksfc->w ; x++)
00174    {
00175     if(Planes.getbit(4))
00176      pixel[y*masksfc->w + x] = ((Uint8*)pixsfc->pixels)[y*pixsfc->w + x];
00177     else
00178      pixel[y*masksfc->w + x] = 15;
00179    }
00180   }
00181   if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(masksfc)) SDL_UnlockSurface(masksfc);
00182   if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(pixsfc)) SDL_UnlockSurface(pixsfc);
00183  }
00184 
00185  
00186  if(RawData){ delete[] RawData; RawData = NULL;}
00187  
00188  // Now load the special TGA Sprites if some are available
00189  LoadSpecialSprites( g_pGfxEngine->getSpriteVec() );
00190 
00191  for(Uint16 s=0 ; s<g_pGfxEngine->getSpriteVec().size() ; s++)
00192  {
00193   CSprite &Sprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(s);
00194   Sprite.optimizeSurface();
00195 
00196   if(s < m_numsprites )
00197   {
00198    std::string filename;
00199    filename = getResourceFilename("gfx/sprite" + itoa(s) + ".bmp", m_gamepath, false, true);
00200    if(filename != "")
00201     Sprite.loadHQSprite(filename);
00202   }
00203   Sprite.applyTransparency();
00204  }
00205  
00206  // Apply the sprites for player 2,3 and 4
00207  DerivePlayerSprites( g_pGfxEngine->getSpriteVec() );
00208 
00209  // Now create special sprites, like those for effects and the doors!
00210  DeriveSpecialSprites( g_pGfxEngine->getTileMap(1), g_pGfxEngine->getSpriteVec() );
00211 
00212  // Here special Effects are applied, only when the option is enabled for it
00213  if(g_pVideoDriver->getSpecialFXConfig())
00214   ApplySpecialFX();
00215 
00216  return true;
00217 }
00218 
00219 // load a 32-bit RGBA TGA file into sprite 's', and add colors to the palette
00220 // as needed so that it can be shown exactly as found in the file.
00221 // returns nonzero on failure.
00222 char CEGASprit::LoadTGASprite( const std::string &filename, CSprite &sprite )
00223 {
00224  unsigned char *image, *base;
00225  int x,y;
00226  int w,h;
00227  unsigned char r,g,b,a;
00228  int c;
00229  Uint8 *pixel, *maskpx;
00230  
00231  // Look in local location than in global, if tga was not found!
00232  if (LoadTGA(filename, &image, &w, &h))
00233   return 1;
00234 
00235  base = image;
00236  sprite.setSize(w, h);
00237  sprite.createSurface( g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface->flags, g_pGfxEngine->Palette.m_Palette );
00238  
00239  SDL_Surface *sfc = sprite.getSDLSurface();
00240  SDL_Surface *msksfc = sprite.getSDLMaskSurface();
00241  
00242  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(sfc)) SDL_LockSurface(sfc);
00243  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(msksfc)) SDL_LockSurface(msksfc);
00244  
00245  pixel = (Uint8*) sfc->pixels;
00246  maskpx = (Uint8*) msksfc->pixels;
00247  
00248  for(y=h-1;y>=0;y--)
00249  {
00250   for(x=0;x<w;x++)
00251   {
00252    b = *image++; g = *image++; r = *image++; a = *image++;
00253    if (a & 128)
00254    {
00255     c = g_pGfxEngine->Palette.getcolor(r, g, b);
00256     if (c==-1) c = g_pGfxEngine->Palette.addcolor(r, g, b);
00257     if (c==-1) return 1;
00258     
00259     pixel[y*w + x] = c;
00260     maskpx[y*w + x] = 15;
00261    }
00262    else
00263     maskpx[y*w + x] = 0;
00264   }
00265  }
00266  
00267  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(msksfc)) SDL_UnlockSurface(msksfc);
00268  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(sfc))  SDL_UnlockSurface(sfc);
00269  
00270  sprite.m_bboxX1=0;
00271  sprite.m_bboxY1=0;
00272  sprite.m_bboxX2=sprite.getWidth();
00273  sprite.m_bboxY2=sprite.getHeight();
00274  
00275  delete [] base;
00276  
00277  return 0;
00278 }

00280 // load special clonekeen-specific sprites from the .raw files
00281 // Code by Caitlin Shaw
00282 void CEGASprit::LoadSpecialSprites( std::vector<CSprite> &sprite )
00283 {
00284  LoadTGASprite(getResourceFilename("gfx/100.tga", m_gamepath, false, true), sprite[PT100_SPRITE] );
00285  LoadTGASprite(getResourceFilename("gfx/200.tga", m_gamepath, false, true), sprite[PT200_SPRITE] );
00286  LoadTGASprite(getResourceFilename("gfx/500.tga", m_gamepath, false, true), sprite[PT500_SPRITE] );
00287  LoadTGASprite(getResourceFilename("gfx/1000.tga", m_gamepath, false, true), sprite[PT1000_SPRITE] );
00288  LoadTGASprite(getResourceFilename("gfx/5000.tga", m_gamepath, false, true), sprite[PT5000_SPRITE] );
00289  LoadTGASprite(getResourceFilename("gfx/lives.tga", m_gamepath, false, true), sprite[LIVES_SPRITE] );
00290  LoadTGASprite(getResourceFilename("gfx/shots.tga", m_gamepath, false, true), sprite[SHOTS_SPRITE] );
00291  //LoadTGASprite("arrowud.tga", sprite[ARROWUD_SPRITE] );
00292  //LoadTGASprite("arrowul.tga", sprite[ARROWUL_SPRITE] );
00293  //LoadTGASprite("arrowur.tga", sprite[ARROWUR_SPRITE] );
00294  //LoadTGASprite("arrowu.tga", sprite[ARROWU_SPRITE] );
00295  //LoadTGASprite("arrowd.tga", sprite[ARROWD_SPRITE] );
00296 }
00297 
00298 void CEGASprit::DerivePlayerSprites( std::vector<CSprite> &sprites )
00299 {
00300  // create the sprites for player 2, 3 and 4
00301  for(size_t i=0;i<48;i++)
00302  {
00303   size_t s = SECOND_PLAYER_BASEFRAME+i;
00304   sprites.at(i).copy( sprites.at(s), g_pGfxEngine->Palette.m_Palette );
00305   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 13, 11 ,0 );
00306   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 5, 3 ,0 );
00307   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 12, 9 ,0 );
00308   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 4, 1 ,0 );
00309   sprites.at(s).optimizeSurface();
00310  }
00311  for(size_t i=0;i<48;i++)
00312  {
00313   size_t s = THIRD_PLAYER_BASEFRAME+i;
00314 
00315   sprites.at(i).copy( sprites.at(s), g_pGfxEngine->Palette.m_Palette );
00316   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 13, 10, 0 ); // Shirt light
00317   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 5, 2, 0 ); // Shirt dark
00318   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 12, 2, 16 ); // Shoes light
00319   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 4, 0, 16 ); // Shoes dark
00320   sprites.at(s).optimizeSurface();
00321 
00322  }
00323  for(size_t i=0;i<48;i++)
00324  {
00325   size_t s = FOURTH_PLAYER_BASEFRAME+i;
00326   sprites.at(i).copy( sprites.at(s), g_pGfxEngine->Palette.m_Palette );
00327   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 13, 14, 0 ); // Shirt light
00328   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 5, 6, 0 ); // Shirt dark
00329   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 12, 6, 16 ); // Shoes light
00330   sprites.at(s).replaceSpriteColor( 4, 0, 16 ); // Shoes dark
00331   sprites.at(s).optimizeSurface();
00332  }
00333 
00334  // Load special if there are any
00335  for(size_t s=SECOND_PLAYER_BASEFRAME ; s<FOURTH_PLAYER_BASEFRAME+48 ; s++)
00336  {
00337   std::string filename = getResourceFilename("gfx/sprite" + itoa(s) + ".bmp", m_gamepath, false, true);
00338   if(filename != "")
00339   {
00340    CSprite &Sprite = sprites.at(s);
00341    Sprite.loadHQSprite(filename);
00342    Sprite.applyTransparency();
00343   }
00344  }
00345 }

00347 // This function has the task to make some items-tiles
00348 // be painted into yellow, so they look nice, when they are
00349 // collected
00350 void CEGASprit::DeriveSpecialSprites( CTilemap &tilemap, std::vector<CSprite> &sprites )
00351 {
00352  std::vector<CTileProperties>& TileProperties = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties();
00353  // Yellow sprites a special effect when items are collected
00354  for( Uint16 t=0 ; t<TileProperties.size() ; t++)
00355  {
00356   // The Gun!
00357   if( TileProperties.at(t).behaviour==15 )
00358    CreateYellowSpriteofTile( tilemap, t, sprites.at(GUNUP_SPRITE) );
00359   
00360   // Keycards
00361   if( TileProperties.at(t).behaviour==18 ) CreateYellowSpriteofTile( tilemap, t, sprites.at(PTCARDY_SPRITE));
00362   if( TileProperties.at(t).behaviour==19 ) CreateYellowSpriteofTile( tilemap, t, sprites.at(PTCARDR_SPRITE));
00363   if( TileProperties.at(t).behaviour==20 ) CreateYellowSpriteofTile( tilemap, t, sprites.at(PTCARDG_SPRITE));
00364   if( TileProperties.at(t).behaviour==21 ) CreateYellowSpriteofTile( tilemap, t, sprites.at(PTCARDB_SPRITE));
00365   
00366   // Single Bullet in Ep3
00367   if( TileProperties.at(t).behaviour==28 )
00368    CreateYellowSpriteofTile( tilemap, t, sprites.at(SHOTUP_SPRITE) );
00369   
00370   if( TileProperties.at(t).behaviour==27 )
00371    CreateYellowSpriteofTile( tilemap, t, sprites.at(ANKHUP_SPRITE) );
00372  }
00373 
00374  for(size_t i=1 ; i < TileProperties.size() ; i++ )
00375  {
00376   if(TileProperties.at(i).behaviour == DOOR_YELLOW)
00377    g_pGfxEngine->copyTileToSprite(i-1, DOOR_YELLOW_SPRITE, 2);
00378 
00379   if(TileProperties.at(i).behaviour == DOOR_RED)
00380    g_pGfxEngine->copyTileToSprite(i-1, DOOR_RED_SPRITE, 2);
00381 
00382   if(TileProperties.at(i).behaviour == DOOR_GREEN)
00383    g_pGfxEngine->copyTileToSprite(i-1, DOOR_GREEN_SPRITE, 2);
00384 
00385   if(TileProperties.at(i).behaviour == DOOR_BLUE)
00386    g_pGfxEngine->copyTileToSprite(i-1, DOOR_BLUE_SPRITE, 2);
00387   }
00388 
00389     // TODO: Demo-Sprite must be added. This time loaded from one TGA File! The TGA is already there!
00390 }
00391 
00392 void CEGASprit::CreateYellowSpriteofTile( CTilemap &tilemap, Uint16 tile, CSprite& sprite )
00393 {
00394  SDL_Rect tile_rect;
00395  
00396  tile_rect.x = 16*(tile%13);
00397  tile_rect.y = 16*(tile/13);
00398  tile_rect.w = tile_rect.h= 16;
00399  
00400  sprite.setSize(tile_rect.w, tile_rect.h);
00401  sprite.createSurface( g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface->flags,
00402         g_pGfxEngine->Palette.m_Palette );
00403  sprite.optimizeSurface();
00404  
00405  SDL_Surface *src_sfc = sprite.getSDLSurface();
00406  
00407  SDL_BlitSurface(tilemap.getSDLSurface(), &tile_rect, src_sfc, NULL);
00408  
00409  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(src_sfc)) SDL_LockSurface(src_sfc);
00410  
00411  if(src_sfc->format->BitsPerPixel == 8) return;
00412 
00413  // The first pixel is usually the transparent one on items. Use it!
00414  Uint8* pixel = (Uint8*)src_sfc->pixels;
00415  Uint32 transparent_colour;
00416  Uint32 colour;
00417  Uint8 r,g,b,a;
00418  memcpy(&transparent_colour, pixel, src_sfc->format->BytesPerPixel);
00419  for(Uint8 x=0 ; x<16 ; x++)
00420  {
00421   for(Uint8 y=0 ; y<16 ; y++)
00422   {
00423    memcpy(&colour, pixel, src_sfc->format->BytesPerPixel);
00424    SDL_GetRGBA( colour, src_sfc->format, &r, &g, &b, &a );
00425    if( colour == transparent_colour )
00426     a = 0;
00427    if( r!=0 && g!=0 && b!=0 && a!=0)
00428     r = g = 255;
00429    
00430    colour = SDL_MapRGBA( src_sfc->format, r, g, b, a );
00431    memcpy( pixel, &colour ,src_sfc->format->BytesPerPixel);
00432    
00433    pixel += src_sfc->format->BytesPerPixel;
00434   }
00435  }
00436  
00437  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(src_sfc)) SDL_UnlockSurface(src_sfc);
00438 }
00439 
00440 /**
00441  * \brief This function applies translucy to some sprite objects when Special FX option is enabled
00442  */
00443 void CEGASprit::ApplySpecialFX()
00444 {
00445  switch(m_Episode)
00446  {
00447  case 1:
00448   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(OBJ_RAY_DEFSPRITE_EP1).applyTranslucency(200);
00449   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(RAY_FRAME_ZAP_EP1).applyTranslucency(200);
00450   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(RAY_FRAME_ZOT_EP1).applyTranslucency(200);
00451   break;
00452  case 2:
00453   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(OBJ_RAY_DEFSPRITE_EP2).applyTranslucency(200);
00454   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(RAY_FRAME_ZAP_EP2).applyTranslucency(200);
00455   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(RAY_FRAME_ZOT_EP2).applyTranslucency(200);
00456   break;
00457  case 3:
00458   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(OBJ_RAY_DEFSPRITE_EP3).applyTranslucency(200);
00459   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(RAY_FRAME_ZAP_EP3).applyTranslucency(200);
00460   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(RAY_FRAME_ZOT_EP3).applyTranslucency(200);
00461   break;
00462  default: break;
00463  }
00464 
00465  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PT100_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00466  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PT200_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00467  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PT500_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00468  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PT1000_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00469  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PT5000_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00470 
00471  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PTCARDY_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00472  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PTCARDG_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00473  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PTCARDR_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00474  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PTCARDB_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00475 
00476  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(GUNUP_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00477  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(SHOTUP_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00478  g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(ANKHUP_SPRITE).applyTranslucency(196);
00479 
00480 }

00482 CEGASprit::~CEGASprit() {
00483  if(EGASpriteModell) delete [] EGASpriteModell, EGASpriteModell = NULL;
00484 }
